| Narrative
IUSSS requested Boston SWAT & MSP STOP Team support for visit of VPOTUS to Boston (Mistral restaurant - 223
Columbus Ave) and Cambridge (Harvard University)

 

Both Teams deployed CAT & Counter Sniper Assets as requested - BPD SWAT CS covered the Boston Venue while
IMSP STOP CS covered Logan Airport

Both Teams provided CAT teams for the motorcade which stayed together and travelled to Cambridge & back to
Logan - Cambridge PD SWAT did deploy around the Harvard venue

 

 

There were no issues surrrounding this visit
